name: Westwoud Wurgpartij
description:
Fight as one of two (2!!!!) fighters in this hyper-realistic fighting game. This game can only be played with TWO players since I haven't programmed any AI players.

P1 controls: Arrow keys + NUMPAD 4569

  • Light attack: 4
  • Heavy attack: 5
  • Special: 6
  • Taunt/Build meter: 9
  • Super1: 4+9
  • Super2: 5+9

P2 controls:  WASD + 4567

  • Light attack: 4
  • Heavy attack: 5
  • Special: 6
  • Taunt/Build meter: 7
  • Super1: 4+7
  • Super2: 5+7
